title: Taliban declares 'amnesty,' encourages women to join new government
content:
1. Taliban declares 'amnesty,' encourages women to join new government  WYFF Greenville
  2. Afghanistan's first female mayor, Zarifa Ghafari waits for the Taliban to killher | Oneindia News  Oneindia News

  4. Female Afghan Mayor Zarifa Ghafari says she's sitting duck waiting for Taliban to kill her  New York Post

localize.title: タリバンが「アムネスティ」を宣言、女性の新政府への参加を促す
